channel.title: Could I advertise my website?
channel.description:
Ok, some (or many) of you know I run "Graphics Shop" & I just made a website (beta version) for it, but i was wondering... Could I advertise my website on my thread?
I only posted to get approval permission... & Website for making websites, logo & signatures for people. Heres original link http://graphicsshop.co.nr/
&
Heres my thread that I'll link on http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,163838.0.html
Let me know if I can please, really want this to happen :rolleyes:...
